name: Vernier Graphical Analysis Project
summary: A GAMBL file is a project created by Vernier Graphical Analysis, a program for analyzing object movement tracked by the Vernier Go! Motion sensor. It contains one or more recorded data sets organized into tables and graphs. Graphical Analysis users save project data as GAMBL files they can modify and export to other formats, such as .PNG , .CSV , and .PDF files.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
